name: Cubby 2D
description:
Cubby is a game made by Unity 2020.3. Project created at 6 August 2021 14:00.Game Controls

Game is not finished yet its on v0.1

  • W, ↑, {Space} - for Jump
  • A, ← - for go Left
  • D, → - for go Right

How to play

  • Get all of the yellow points.
  • Then go to finish line 

Extra features

  • Double jump
  • Wall climbing
  • S-Ball: makes you small and your mass decreases
  • N-Ball: makes you normal and your mass gets normal
  • B-Ball: makes you big and your mass increases a lot
  • Gravity balls: adjusts gravity
